alert.note: Alert for Eastern Addison; Eastern Chittenden; Eastern Rutland; Essex; Western Rutland (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 17 at 3:16AM EST until January 17 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...East winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Western Rutland, Essex, Eastern Rutland, Eastern Chittenden and Eastern Addison Counties. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down due to these strong wind gusts, resulting in isolated to scattered power outages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest wind gusts are expected to take place between now and 9 AM this morning. The potential for snow loading in portions of the southern Greens will result in an increased potential for scattered power outages.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Addison; Eastern Chittenden; Eastern Rutland; Essex; Western Rutland
